data.system_settings: Android 7.0, Moto G4 & LT Android Tribute
data.actual_result: User can edit the locked channel from Android but not Desktop
data.expected_result: User shouldn't be able to edit a channel their locked out of on any platform
data.short_description: User can edit locked Voice Channel settings on mobile with the "Manage Channels" permissions
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable Manage Channels Permission to a role - Assign role to an Android mobile user - Have the user try editing a locked Voice Channel
